profile:
ASM Pest Control is a leading pest extermination company located in the Lower Mainland, BC. We are a trusted Essential Service Provider keeping our staff and clients, who are the utmost of importance to us, safe during Covid19. Offering prompt same day service including 24HR Emergency availability. We are here for you! With a team of licensed and insured pest control experts, we are proudly serving residential, commercial and industrial clients with a wide range of ant, rat, cockroach and bed bug control services among many others. Each and every member of ASM Pest Control understands that the homes and businesses of our clients are critically important and must be treated with respect. Our technicians focus on creating effective, long-term solutions for specific pest problems. Call or click the get a quote button for your immediate quote on our services. We we are proud to offer full services to each of our clients including inspection, trapping, control, extermination, prevention and follow-up after completion of services. 

We're social here:
